scripts.start: npm run dev & web-ext run -s extension -u http://localhost:8080 -u about:debugging#/runtime/this-firefox && kill $!
scripts.build:icons: for size in 16 24 32 48 96 128; do if [ ! -e extension/icons/icon-$size.png -o logo/logo.svg -nt extension/icons/icon-$size.png ]; then svgexport logo/logo.svg extension/icons/icon-$size.png $size:; fi; done
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix app && npm run build:icons && web-ext build -s extension --overwrite-dest && git archive -o ../svelte-reactive-debugger.zip HEAD
